reviewText: This is a vivid, seemingly very authentic one-woman portrayal of Harriet Tubman.  It is on the short side, so it's perfect for showing to a class, as I did.  Though I don't know that all my students found it compelling, I'm quite sure they were well informed by it.
This reenactment of Harriet Tubman is a one woman show by Gwendolyn Briley-Strand. It is an excellent  source of historical information about Harriet Tubman.
